title: Live in personal assistant/cook/ driver
salary: 500 USD per month to start , time off, free rent, free travel, bonus
job_overview:
Assistant for a retired American and his wife. Live in position. Must possess excellent communication skills, organization skills and be able to identify problems before they arise. Manage medical appointments, have detailed knowledge of Manila, Clark City and Angeles. Be a total team player. 
We’re looking for a young woman or man who is interested in becoming the a true family support partner. Must be knowledge about medical care. ( this is NOT a nurse position). 

Employer is demanding, but the right employee will be rewarded. Long term ( five years)  or longer is highly valued by employer.
